Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces broke through the 'Poroshenko Line...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Visual Confirmation: Russian forces advanced to Proletariat Street, northern New York (Toretsk direction). A Russian flag was hoisted over the school on Proletariat Street, at 48.3365, 37.82349. Russian troops now control 49.6% of New York. 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces broke through the 'Poroshenko Line' in the Toretsk direction – both sides confirm.Russian forces have captured the fortifications and advanced beyond the main line of defense in the Donbass built by Ukraine between 2014-2017. Ukrainian forces withdrew west of New York's lakes.Russian troops have also entered Pantaleymonovka, west of New York.In the city itself, Ukrainian forces recaptured the school on Proletariat Street.Russian forces now control 68% of New York.
